title: Bug 3666 - CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
description: Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class. As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.
EB: The code should be changed to: baz(x.foo().foo())
SR:
1. Open the provided class.
2. In the 'bar' method, add a parameter to the 'baz' call.
3. Replace the code with 'baz(x.foo().foo())'.
